alert.note: Alert for Cannon; De Kalb; Rutherford; Smith; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 10:11PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Smith, De Kalb, northeastern Rutherford, southeastern Wilson and northern Cannon Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1010 PM CDT, the public reported pea size hail with a strong thunderstorm over Murfreesboro, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Smithville, Watertown, Gordonsville, Walterhill, Hickman, Alexandria, Dowelltown, Liberty, Auburntown, Lascassas, Center Hill Lake, Edgar Evans State Park, Milton, Readyville and Cedars Of Lebanon State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 254 and 265. Interstate 24 between mile markers 72 and 85. Interstate 840 between mile markers 52 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cannon; De Kalb; Rutherford; Smith; Wilson
